backend/main.mo: Actor exposes a test function that returns caller principal and traps if anonymous.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing two UI-related features, their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind config defining CSS variables, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing global state, authentication, plan selection, scrolling, and section rendering.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI component handling Internet Identity login/logout with status display.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Badge component showing the current selected plan with icon labeling.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animation wrapper component that reveals children with fade-in-up when in view.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Generates and downloads card images using canvas, supporting templates and text wrapping.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Utility to load static background images with cross-origin support for canvas use.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Text wrapping helper returning line-broken text constrained to a max width.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines the SampleWish interface and provides a list of preset birthday wishes with varying tones and relationships.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Exports preset option lists for relationships, tones, languages, and personalities used by the generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack object into a single decorated string for display or sharing.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates all components of a BirthdayPack using form inputs and language-specific phrase templates.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides language-specific phrase sets and a helper to select the correct pack based on language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized GeneratorFormData values using predefined option lists and sample names.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and interfaces for form inputs, birthday pack outputs, and template IDs.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns combined CSS classes for a given template ID to style birthday card previews.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Maps template background image keys to static file paths and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines available card templates with their styling, icons, colors, and background image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook that tracks whether a referenced element is in viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages a user's selected plan with localStorage persistence scoped to their principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and tracks the user's reduced‑motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to confirm the authenticated caller's principal, returning null when anonymous.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom neon‑themed design tokens, components, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Copies text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens a principal string for UI display by showing leading and trailing characters.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link by encoding provided text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Displays sample wishes with tone filtering using cards and animated reveals.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders a FAQ list using an accordion with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Shows the site footer with links, app info, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Provides the form and logic for generating, randomizing, copying, and sharing birthday packs, with validation and UI controls.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing hero with branding, auth prompts, and buttons to generate wishes or view examples.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Displays static Privacy Policy and Terms of Service sections using styled cards.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Shows generated birthday outputs with options to copy, share, or export a card image.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Lists available plans and lets users select a plan, highlighting the active one.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Allows selecting a card template and previews the card using the generated main wish.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, fonts, and animations with dark mode and custom neon theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture, gating flow, and a list of existing implemented features for WishMint AI.
